title: Cover Page, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: Signature at bottom below text in grey :[Nicholas Africano]
description: title page from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; all text; comparing lilacs and a man
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
